mapper.select: select q.qno, q.qtitle, q.qregdate, q.qstatus u.uno, from tbl_qna q inner join tbl_user u on q.uno = u.uno where q.uno = #{uno} and q.qdelete = false order by q.qno desc limit #{pageRequest.skip}, #{pageRequest.size}

select q.qno, q.qtitle, q.qcontent, q.qanswer, q.qfilename, q.qregdate, q.qmoddate, u.uno, p.pno from tbl_qna q inner join tbl_user u on q.uno = u.uno left join tbl_product p on q.pno = p.pno where q.qno = #{qno} and q.qdelete = false
select count(q.qno) from tbl_qna q where q.uno = #{uno} and q.qdelete = false
